info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 10 at 5:30AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW BAND... HAZARDS...A lake effect snow band which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 530 AM EST, a lake effect snow band was over Troy moving southeast at 35 MPH. THIS LAKE EFFECT SNOW BAND WILL BE NEAR... West Sand Lake around 540 AM EST. Averill Park around 545 AM EST. Stephentown and Berlin around 555 AM EST. Hancock around 605 AM EST. New Ashford around 610 AM EST. Adams and Cheshire around 620 AM EST. Pittsfield around 625 AM EST. Savoy around 630 AM EST. This includes the following highways... Interstate 88 near exit 25. Interstate 90 between exits 8 and 28. Interstate 890 between exits 1a and 9. Interstate 87 between exits 24 and 7, and near exit 8A. Interstate 787 between exits 5 and 9. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this lake effect snow band. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
